hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:A Bedouin stood up and started making water in the mosque. The people caught him but the Prophet (ﷺ) ordered them to leave him and to pour a bucket or a tumbler of water over the place where he had passed the urine. The Prophet (ﷺ) then said, "You have been sent to make things easy and not to make them difficult

chapter.ara-name: باب صَبِّ الْمَاءِ عَلَى الْبَوْلِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: The pouring of water over the urine in the mosque
